data.name: Pimania Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Official soundtrack to the baffling ZX Spectrum text adventure Pimania, by pioneering British computer games company Automata UK. Originally released as the B-side of the cassette tape, this single contained various cryptic hints to some of the game's puzzles hidden in its weird lyrics.


Vocals: Clair Sinclive and the Mystery Man

Percussion and Bass: ZX Spectrum, casio VC-1

Guitars and Saxes: The Pi men
